en-US.alert_about: Create while loops in your shortcuts and run selected shortcuts in a continuous loop with options to minimize battery life and prevent early termination using Guided Access.
en-US.alert_buy_license:
Enter the email address you provided during payment and the license key that you received.

Once verified, the Pro features of {{APPNAME}} will be unlocked.
en-US.alert_buy_success: Thank you for purchasing {{APPNAME}} and for supporting my efforts to create advanced shortcuts!
en-US.alert_buy_failure:
The license key you entered could not be validated.

Please make sure you have entered it correctly and try again.
en-US.alert_buy_trial:
Enjoy using the Pro features of {{APPNAME}} for seven days.

You can always purchase before your trial is complete to unlock {{APPNAME}}.

Payment is fast and convenient with Apple Pay!
en-US.alert_buy_trialExpired:
Your trial of {{APPNAME}} has expired. You can continue to use the application, but Pro features such as Guided Access, Appearance Toggling, Callback Shortcuts, and Notify When Stops Running have been disable.

Purchase a Pro license quickly and easily with Apple Pay.
en-US.alert_copied_UUID:
The unique identifier of this {{REPEATCUT}} has been copied to your clipboard.

You can run this {{REPEATCUT}} from another shortcut using the Run Shortcut action with {{APPNAME}} and the following dictionary as input:
en-US.alert_run:
Your shortcut will run repeatedly according to the settings below.

To prevent iOS from prematurely stopping the {{REPEATCUT}}, keep the Shortcuts app as the frontmost application.
en-US.alert_scriptable_watcher:
{{REPEATCUTS_WATCHER}} will let you know when {{APPNAME}} has exited prematurely.

 Complete installation by creating a new script in {{SCRIPTABLE}} called `{{REPEATCUTS_WATCHER}}` and pasting in the contents of the clipboard.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of {{APPNAME}}.
en-US.alert_welcome:
{{APPNAME}} enables you to run shortcuts in a continuous foreground loop with options to minimize battery life and prevent early termination using Guided Access.

For developers, {{APPNAME}} provides while loops functionality to your shortcuts.
en-US.alert_welcome_complete: {{APPNAME}} is ready for use. What would you like to do next?
en-US.alert_welcome_pro:
Purchase {{APPNAME}} to unlock Pro features such as:

• Guided Access
• Appearance Toggling to preserve display life
• Callback Shortcuts
• Notifications when loops stop prematurely

Trial these features for seven days before purchasing quickly and conveniently with Apple Pay.
en-US.menu_run_hideAlert: Run and Don't Show Alert Again
en-US.prompt_appearanceToggle: Periodically toggle between Light and Dark mode on this device to preserve display life and minimize screen burn-in and image retention.
en-US.prompt_appearanceToggle_set: Enter the number of seconds to wait before toggling the appearance of the display between Light and Dark.
en-US.prompt_brightness:
Set the screen brightness from 0 to 100 when running {{APPNAME}}.

Enter a number outside of that range to keep the brightness at its current value.
en-US.prompt_buy:
Purchase {{APPNAME}} to unlock Pro features such as Guided Access, Appearance Toggling, Notify with {{SCRIPTABLE}}, and Callback Shortcuts.

It's quick and easy with Apple Pay or PayPal.

You will receive a license key to unlock the Pro features.

Thanks in advance for your support!
en-US.prompt_callback: Do you want to use a custom callback shortcut with this shortcut?
en-US.prompt_callback_shortcut:
Select a shortcut to be used as a callback.

If the shortcut returns ❌❌❌, the loop will terminate.

Otherwise, the callback return value will be used as input in the next call to the shortcut.
en-US.prompt_count:
Enter the number of times to run this shortcut.

Enter 0 to run the shortcut continuously.
en-US.prompt_delete: Delete this {{REPEATCUT}}? This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_description: Enter an optional description for this {{REPEATCUT}}
en-US.prompt_erase_content:
Are you sure you want to delete all {{APPNAME}} content and settings for this device?

All of your existing {{APPNAME}} will be deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_erase_content2:
Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to delete all {{APPNAME}} content and settings for this device?

All of your existing {{APPNAME}} will be deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_interval:
Add a delay between each call to the shortcut.

{{APPNAME}} can wait any number of seconds, minutes, or hours when running the shortcut in the foreground.
en-US.prompt_interval_value: Enter the number of {{INTERVALTYPE}} to wait between calls to the shortcut:
en-US.prompt_loopsBuy: You have run {{COUNT}} loops with {{APPNAME}}. Purchase a license to remove this notice and unlock Pro features in {{APPNAME}}.
en-US.prompt_name: Enter a descriptive name for your new {{REPEATCUT}}.
en-US.prompt_reset: This operation will reset your {{APPNAME}} settings or erase all RepeatCuts data.
en-US.prompt_reset_settings:
Are you sure you want to reset {{APPNAME}} settings on this device?

None of your content will be affected.
en-US.prompt_shortcut: Select a shortcut to run repeatedly:
en-US.prompt_volume:
Set the volume from 0 to 100 when running {{APPNAME}}.

Enter a number outside of that range to keep the volume at its current value.
